featured.text: A dog’s cognitive profile is composed of nine cognitive skills.
At the end, you get a report of your dog’s cognitive profile.
One former prime minister considered it important enough to reveal in his official profile that he was a type A, while his opposition rival was type B.

definition.zh_def: 個人資料或特徵的描述，通常用於社交媒體或專業網站上。
definition.en_def: A description of an individual's personal characteristics or information, often used on social media or professional websites.
definition.example: She updated her profile to include her new job and interests.
